repositories.name: Project Name
repositories.description: A brief description of what this project does and its key features

repositories.name: Pegasus
repositories.description: A powerful evaluation framework for Large Language Models using RAGAS and DeepEval metrics, with native support for Google Cloud's Vertex AI.
features: Dual evaluation frameworks: RAGAS metrics for comprehensive RAG evaluation & DeepEval metrics for general LLM evaluation
Native Google Cloud Vertex AI integration
Configurable via JSON with support for all major evaluation metrics
Pandas DataFrame interface for easy data handling
